user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Sarah at Helping Hands Foundation (sarah@helpinghands.org) with an update on the student'"'"'s involvement. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for latest details on our student volunteer

Hi Team,

I’m drafting an update email for Sarah at the Helping Hands Foundation and need the most recent information on our student volunteer. Could you please:

1. Check my Gmail for the latest threads with the student and their mentor (last 30 days) and forward/flag anything noteworthy.
2. Open our Notion workspace and copy the current hours, tasks completed, upcoming commitments, and any mentor feedback in the “Student Volunteers” database for this student.
3. Let me know if there are any red-flag issues or highlights I should include.

A brief summary or a single document with the key points would be perfect. If you could get this to me by tomorrow afternoon, I’d really appreciate it.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best,  
John

final_output:
Subject: Request for latest details on our student volunteer

Hi Team,

I’m drafting an update email for Sarah at the Helping Hands Foundation and need the most recent information on our student volunteer. Could you please:

1. Check my Gmail for the latest threads with the student and their mentor (last 30 days) and forward/flag anything noteworthy.
2. Open our Notion workspace and copy the current hours, tasks completed, upcoming commitments, and any mentor feedback in the “Student Volunteers” database for this student.
3. Let me know if there are any red-flag issues or highlights I should include.

A brief summary or a single document with the key points would be perfect. If you could get this to me by tomorrow afternoon, I’d really appreciate it.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best,  
John
